explanation: [0-0] A left hand wearing a glove is holding a can of orange paint, the rim of the paint can is stained with paint. In front of it is a gray brick wall, and below it is a light yellow table top with wood grain.

[0-5] Then the camera zooms in, a silver metal screwdriver appears from the right side, a right hand holds the screwdriver and uses the top of the screwdriver against the edge of the paint can lid to pry open the lid of the paint can. A left hand takes the lid of the paint can from the left, and a red cross appears at the top of the screen.

[7-10] Then the picture switches, a right hand holds the upper part of the cut plastic bottle and puts it on the paint can, then a hand wearing gloves turns the orange bottle cap, a hand is holding something like a hair dryer and blowing it at the bottle, and then the upper part of the bottle is connected to the paint can.

[10-13] After that, the paint can connected with the upper part of the bottle is placed on the right side of the light yellow table top, and a transparent container is placed on the left side of the light yellow table top.
